resources.string: Remove this device from list of connected devices?
Calls are restricted in meeting mode, and SMS are automatically displayed in the foreground. Enable meeting mode?
Current connection must be disconnected first to switch mode.\nDo you want to switch now?
Video mode will share screen content via dongle only. \nCurrent connection must be disconnected to switch modes. \nContinue?

Audio mode will share audio via dongle only. Before switching to audio mode, confirm that it is supported by your dongle, otherwise the connection will not be successful. \nCurrent connection must be disconnected to switch modes. \nContinue?
Another device already connected, please disconnect first
Can not connect, device not available
Operation only available for connected devices
Connect the AllShare Cast dongle to an HDMI device using the HDMI A-TO-A cable.
When the red indicator begin to flash, click reset button. Wait for the indicator to turn blue. No need to click it again when reconnecting.
Enter Miracast, then toggle Enable button to On. The names of devices available for connection will then appear in the list of available devices
If successfully connected, you can share your screen with another device.
If audio output is supported by the dongle, you can try Audio Only mode to experience wireless music.
If you want to connect to a dongle with DVI or VGA interface, Video Only mode is recommended.
